Title: Stranger in a Strange Land.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=ZQhiPwAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Epic, entertaining, Stranger in a Strange Land caused controversy and uproar when it was first published. Still topical and challenging today, the story of Valentine Michael Smith, the first man from Mars to visit Earth, is in the great tradition of stories that endure through the power of the author's imagination that stretches from Gulliver's Travels to 1984.
